body:
Lets merge this pull request and have a new pull request to add OSG-test. 

-Derek

> On Feb 14, 2016, at 6:15 AM, Brian Bockelman notifications@github.com wrote:
> 
> In particular, since we're inside a Docker container running as root ... Can we run osg-test?
> 
> Sent from my iPhone
> 
> > On Feb 10, 2016, at 7:41 PM, Derek Weitzel notifications@github.com wrote:
> > 
> > I disabled the install test for EL7. HTCondor fails due to some tmp filesystem issues. You can see the error in the failed build. It has something to do with systemd managing tmp filesystem on el7, and docker not having it. I'm not entirely sure.
> > 
> > —
> > Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
> > 
> > —
> > Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
